item.title: ESX 3.5 snapshots of disks on different storage are stored with the VM files
item.description: A.K.A Why not to use snapshots I ran into a slightly confusing problem today - our SQL servers are all createdÂ with 4 disks on 4 separate LUNs (System, Swap, SQL Data and SQL Logs). When viewing the server through Virtual Center I couldn’t see all of the LUNs, just the System LUN. It’s not a major problem as the VM can see the storage, but a little annoying when you have to remember what LUN the disks are on.
